entry.title: Naval Booklist
entry.content:
J. Krishnamurti - 1. Total Freedom 2. Freedom from the Known 3. Think on These Things 4. The Book of Life: Daily Meditations with Krishnamurti

Osho - 5. The Great Challenge 6. Autobiography of a Spiritually Incorrect Mystic 7. Life has NO Goals, NO Purpose 8. The Sun Rises in the Evening 9. Courage: Joy of Living Dangerously

  1. All of Jed McKenna’s books - every single one
  2. All of Kapil Gupta’s (@KapilGuptaMD) books - every single one
  3. All of Anthony De Mello’s Books
  4. All books by Matt Ridley (@mattwridley)
  5. Incerto Series by Nassim Nicholas Taleb (@nntaleb): All 5 books

Richard Feynman (@ProfFeynman - Feynman Quotes Profile) - 15. Six Easy Pieces: Essentials of Physics 16. Perfectly Reasonable Deviations
17. “What Do You Care What Other People Think?” 18. Surely You Must Be Joking Mr. Feynman 19. The Feynman Lectures on Physics

Kamal Ravikant (@kamalravikant) - 20. Love Yourself Like Your Life Depends On It 21. Live Your Truth

Carlo Rovelli (@carlorovelli) - 22. Reality Is Not What It Seems 23. Seven Brief Lessons on Physics 24. The Order of Time

David Deutsch (@DavidDeutschOxf) - 25. The Beginning of Infinity: Explanations That Transform the World 26. The Fabric of Reality

Karl Popper - 27. In Search of a Better World 28. The Logic of Scientific Discovery

Will Durant - 29. The Lessons of History (co-authored by Ariel Durant) 30. The Story of Philosophy 31. Fallen Leaves: Last Words on Life, Love, War and God

Scott Adams (@ScottAdamsSays): 32. How to Fail at Almost Everything and Still Win Big 33. God’s Debris: A Thought Experiment

Douglas Adams (@douglasadams): 34. The Salmon of Doubt 35. The Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy

  1. Wind, Sand & Stars by Antoine De Saint Exupery
  2. Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind by Yuval Noah Harari
  3. Poor Charlie’s Almanac: The Wit and Wisdom of Charles T. Munger by Charlie Munger (@CharlieBot - Munger Quotes Profile)
  4. The Power of Now: A Guide to Spiritual Enlightenment by Eckhart Tolle (@EckhartTolle)
  5. The Sovereign Individual: Mastering the Transition to the Information Age by James Dale Davidson
  6. Brahma by Ralph Waldo Emerson
  7. The Prophet by Kahlil Gibran
  8. Good Calories, Bad Calories: Fats, Carbs, and the Controversial Science of Diet and Health by Gary Taubes (@garytaubes)
  9. The Law by Bastiat
  10. Ashtavakra Gita - Bart Marshall Translation
  11. I Am That by Nisargadatta Maharaj
  12. Raja Yoga by Vivekananda
  13. The Way to Wealth by Ben Franklin
  14. Striking Thoughts: Bruce Lee’s Wisdom for Daily Living by Bruce Lee
  15. Meditations by Marcus Aurelius
  16. Tao Te Ching by Lao Tzu
  17. The Bhagavad Gita - Stephen Mitchell translation
  18. The Hagakure by Yamamoto Tsunetomo
  19. Counsels and Maxims by Schopehauer
  20. Vagabond (Manga) by Takehiko Inoue
  21. Influence: The Psychology of Persuasion by Robert Cialdini (@RobertCialdini)
  22. Illusions: The Adventures of a Reluctant Messiah by Richard Bach
  23. Tao of Seneca / Letters of Seneca
  24. Understanding Comics by Scott McCloud
  25. The Way of the Superior Man by David Daida
  26. Harrison Bergeron by Kurt Vonnegut (story)
  27. The Untethered Soul by Michael A. Singer
